name: Composite Project for Monorepo
description:
The composite project allows you to develop multiple add-ons and applications in one IDE workspace. It enables transparent refactorings and eliminates the need to publish add-ons before using them in other add-ons and applications.

This template is best suited for the case where subprojects are stored in a single source code repository.

The created structure contains the aggregating project build scripts in the root folder. Refer to the README file for more information.
